short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TikTok videos transcript and summary with Chat GPT Open AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TokGPT for TikTok takes any videos and gives it a brief summary. You can use our ChatGPT TikTok prompts or upload any custom prompts in 1 click!
Giving you the AI magic you love directly into TikTok, making it easier to analyze any TikTok video with ChatGPT instantly!


Here's how it works:
- Visit any TikTok video and ChatGPT will instantly go to work. 


Unlock the power of content with ChatGPT - the ultimate browser extension for accessing ChatGPT! 
Quickly get the content of any TikTokvideo so you can save time and learn faster. 


Features:
➡️ Choose from any of our high converting ChatGPT prompts for TikTok
➡️ Upload any custom prompts of your own
➡️ Copy and save any outputs GPT creates

_________



Q1: What is ChatGPT?
A1: ChatGPT is an OpenAI-developed language model that utilizes a large pre-trained Transformer-based neural network to generate human-like text in response to user prompts. With its diverse range of training on internet text, ChatGPT can provide responses on various topics, such as general knowledge, conversations, and creative writing.

Q2: What is TokGpt video summary?
A2: TikTok video summary is a written overview of the content in a video on the TikTok platform. The summary provides a quick way to understand the video's topic and important information.

Q3: Is YouTube Videos Summary Easy Copy with ChatGPT free?
A3: Although our extension is currently free, we are exploring the possibility of introducing a small paywall to sustain the service in the future. By upgrading to the paid service, you will enjoy faster response times, unrestricted access, and high-priority customer support. Our ultimate goal is to provide you with the best possible service in a way that is affordable and accessible to everyone.

Q4: Do I need to create a ChatGPT/OpenAI account to use this extension?
A4: Yes, you must have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a free account at chat.openai.com.


_________



We strive to keep up with the fast-paced development of GPT-3 to bring you the best possible experience.

If you encounter an error, try opening OpenAI again. The service may be under high demand.
If you continue to experience issues, please report a bug in the review section of our extension's page
